alert.note: Alert for Klamath; Lake (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued September 16 at 10:45AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5PM PDT MONDAY... The Oregon Department of Environmental Quality has issued an Air Quality Advisory, in effect until 5 pm PDT Monday. This includes northern Klamath County and all of Lake County. Smoke, primarily from the Cedar Creek Fire near Oakridge, will cause air quality levels to fluctuate around unhealthy levels. Southern Lake County may clear by Saturday afternoon, but smoke will likely remain in the northern part of the county through the weekend. Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is not likely to be affected. For additional information...please visit the web site at http://www.oregon.gov/deq
